rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a foyer design that sets the tone for the Art Deco style. The area includes a reception console and natural light accentuating the Vastu principle of positive energy.

A spacious living room with Art Deco decor elements such as geometric patterns and chrome finishes. Large windows provide ample daylight, aligned with Vastu principles for relaxation and social interaction.
A modern kitchen designed in Art Deco style featuring chrome accents and streamlined form. It is placed on the east side for good energy flow as per Vastu.
A duplex studio apartment that integrates both living and sleeping areas with Art Deco furnishing. The layout maximizes space utility while adhering to Vastu guidelines for harmony.
A quiet and well-lit library area with shelves and comfortable seating. The eastward orientation supports the balance of knowledge and tranquility as per Vastu principles.
